item.title: Develop
item.dc:creator: art
item.content:encoded:
Our Approach

You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus

REI is a leading outdoor retailer that was founded in 1893 by a group of climbers in search of quality outdoor gear.

As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in. We found that the core millennial consumer who might be considering this procedure had a bunch of different pain points we needed to identify, within our digital experience because this is a global offering.

Seventy-five years and 129 stores later, their passion still lies in inspiring, educating and outfitting people for a lifetime of outdoor adventures.

Why Choose Us

Responsive Design

We are a multidisciplinary creative team of talented people. With passion, we deliver digital projects.

High Quality

The expertise in fashion photography is strongly influenced by our technical approach to shape light and composition

Fast Loading Speed

We've always been enjoying to experiment new technologies, working with people coming from different backgrounds

Blog Pages

We identify the essential around new visual perspectives

Perfect Coding

Our developers have a lot of expertise in the development of web sites on any frameworks

Friendly Support

We are a multidisciplinary team of experts who are ready to help you

Ready to work with us?

Take your business to the next level with Harizma WordPress Theme!

Puchase now

item.content:encoded:
UI & UX Design

Good design creates a new culture

REI is a leading outdoor retailer that was founded in 1893 by a group of climbers in search of quality outdoor gear.

As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in. We found that the core millennial consumer who might be considering this procedure had a bunch of different pain points we needed to identify, within our digital experience because this is a global offering.

Seventy-five years and 129 stores later, their passion still lies in inspiring, educating and outfitting people for a lifetime of outdoor adventures.

item.title: Analytics
item.dc:creator: art
item.content:encoded:
Deep Thinking

Nail the basics first and detail the details later

REI is a leading outdoor retailer that was founded in 1893 by a group of climbers in search of quality outdoor gear.

As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in. We found that the core millennial consumer who might be considering this procedure had a bunch of different pain points we needed to identify, within our digital experience because this is a global offering.

Seventy-five years and 129 stores later, their passion still lies in inspiring, educating and outfitting people for a lifetime of outdoor adventures.

I'm amazed, I should say thank you so much, design is brilliant and professional, every detail has been taken care, these team are realy amazing and talented agency. By far one of the worlds best known brands.

Michael Spears, CEO of Harizma

For all our design and production needs we have always trusted Harizma Agency for more than 4 years now. Exceptional workmanship, commitment to client satisfaction and their timely delivery are what has kept us stuck with them. They are cool guys too!

Cassio Esfandiari, Marketer in Cassio

Removed demands expense account in outward tedious do. Particular way thoroughly unaffected projection favourable mrs can projecting own. Thirty it matter enable become admire in giving. See resolved goodness felicity shy civility domestic had but. Drawings offended yet answered jennings perceive laughing six did far.

Roberto Valentinuzzi, Art Director in ARENA

Our Work Process

Planning

We do planning before start work

01

Wireframing

Create a design based on the prototype

02

Design

Making develop layout pages

03

Testing

After development we do product tests

04 Discover

Our Projects

item.title: Sony Phones
item.dc:creator: art
item.content:encoded:
Responsive Design

Our passion for design goes beyond beautiful imagery

REI is a leading outdoor retailer that was founded in 1893 by a group of climbers in search of quality outdoor gear. Seventy-five years and 129 stores later, their passion still lies in inspiring, educating and outfitting people for a lifetime of outdoor adventures. As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in. We found that the core millennial consumer who might be considering this procedure had a bunch of different pain points we needed to identify, within our digital experience because this is a global offering.

  • Client: Envato

item.title: Essential Stuff
item.dc:creator: art
item.content:encoded:
Responsive Design

Our passion for design goes beyond beautiful imagery

REI is a leading outdoor retailer that was founded in 1893 by a group of climbers in search of quality outdoor gear. Seventy-five years and 129 stores later, their passion still lies in inspiring, educating and outfitting people for a lifetime of outdoor adventures. As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in. We found that the core millennial consumer who might be considering this procedure had a bunch of different pain points we needed to identify, within our digital experience because this is a global offering.

  • Date: 04 May 2019
  • Client: Envato

item.title: Music Store
item.dc:creator: art
item.content:encoded:
Responsive Design

Design is so simple that's why it's so complicated

REI is a leading outdoor retailer that was founded in 1893 by a group of climbers in search of quality outdoor gear. Seventy-five years and 129 stores later, their passion still lies in inspiring, educating and outfitting people for a lifetime of outdoor adventures. As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in. We found that the core millennial consumer who might be considering this procedure had a bunch of different pain points we needed to identify, within our digital experience because this is a global offering.

  • Date: 04 May 2019
  • Client: Envato
Visit Website

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: art
item.content:encoded:
Who We Are

We craft digital experience

REI is a leading outdoor retailer that was founded in 1893 by a group of climbers in search of quality outdoor gear. As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in. We found that the core millennial consumer who might be considering this procedure had a bunch of different pain points we needed to identify, within our digital experience because this is a global offering. Seventy-five years and 129 stores later, their passion still lies in inspiring, educating and outfitting people for a lifetime of outdoor adventures.
0 Years of Experience 0 Happy Customers 0 Awards Won 0 Successful Cases

Why Choose Us

Responsive Design

We are a multidisciplinary creative team of talented people. With passion, we deliver digital projects.

High Quality

The expertise in fashion photography is strongly influenced by our technical approach to shape light and composition

Fast Loading Speed

We've always been enjoying to experiment new technologies, working with people coming from different backgrounds

Blog Pages

We identify the essential around new visual perspectives

Perfect Coding

Our developers have a lot of expertise in the development of web sites on any frameworks

Friendly Support

We are a multidisciplinary team of experts who are ready to help you

Meet Our Team

T: 8 800 555 35 35 E. hello@harizma.com
Mike Spears Art Director T: 8 800 555 35 35 E. hello@harizma.com
John Marshall Product Designer T: 8 800 555 35 35 E. hello@harizma.com
Robert Anderson Creative Developer I'm amazed, I should say thank you so much, design is brilliant and professional, every detail has been taken care, these team are realy amazing and talented agency. By far one of the worlds best known brands. Michael Spears, CEO of Harizma For all our design and production needs we have always trusted Harizma Agency for more than 4 years now. Exceptional workmanship, commitment to client satisfaction and their timely delivery are what has kept us stuck with them. They are cool guys too! Cassio Esfandiari, Marketer in Cassio Removed demands expense account in outward tedious do. Particular way thoroughly unaffected projection favourable mrs can projecting own. Thirty it matter enable become admire in giving. See resolved goodness felicity shy civility domestic had but. Drawings offended yet answered jennings perceive laughing six did far. Roberto Valentinuzzi, Art Director in ARENA Discover

Our Projects

 Let's Work Together

Contact Us

[{"id":"00d124c","elType":"section","settings":{"css_classes":"section section-about section_mt section_mb","gap":"extended"},"elements":[{"id":"f866f83","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100,"_inline_size":50},"elements":[{"id":"cbea2e9","elType":"widget","settings":{"subheading":"Who We Are","heading":"We craft digital experience","text":"

REI is a leading outdoor retailer that was founded in 1893 by a group of climbers in search of quality outdoor gear.

As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in. We found that the core millennial consumer who might be considering this procedure had a bunch of different pain points we needed to identify, within our digital experience because this is a global offering.

Seventy-five years and 129 stores later, their passion still lies in inspiring, educating and outfitting people for a lifetime of outdoor adventures.

REI is a leading outdoor retailer that was founded in 1893 by a group of climbers in search of quality outdoor gear.

As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in. We found that the core millennial consumer who might be considering this procedure had a bunch of different pain points we needed to identify, within our digital experience because this is a global offering.

Seventy-five years and 129 stores later, their passion still lies in inspiring, educating and outfitting people for a lifetime of outdoor adventures.

Design

Support

Analytics

Mobile Apps

Develop

Our developers have a lot of experience in the development of web sites on any frameworks.

As we learned about the brand, it became clear that this was a procedure millennials could find a lot of value in.
